QuestData.Title: Every Life Counts
QuestData.Description:
Making potions for Gelikyr means that I don't have time for my other duties.
A duck landed in my garden with a broken rib. I've tended to the wound, but her dressing needs replacing. And since you're so eager to help...
<Szareth shoves a list of ingredients into your hand.>
This is what you'll need. Bring the rest to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect ingredients to replace Little Jetstream's dressings.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Szareth takes the extra pollen and linens, then looks toward their hut.>
Ducks have to contend with harpies further up the cliffside. The wounded land here, and I aid them how I can.
I hope this one will make it.
